# Beware of stochastic parrots

-   LLMs don't *understand*, but are good at mimicry
-   Use with care:
    -   May be wrong
    -   May be inconsistent

# Beware of stochastic parrots

-   Tools like ChatGPT pose ethical issues
    -   Plagiarism
    -   Labor conditions
    -   Inputs may be sent to parent companies
